name: Company Folders, Inc
overview: Company Folders knows that every business is unique, which is why our team of marketing magicians works alongside you every step of the way to make sure your presentation materials best represent your companyâ€™s individuality. We have a passion for making your printed presentation products look professional – from folders and ring binders to report covers and portfolios. Need help designing a logo or crafting your brand identity? Our talented team of imaginative designers can help you shape your ideas into works of marketing art. All of our products are made with eco-friendly materials and processes and we have a full line of recycled stocks to choose from. Contact us to get a free sample and see for yourself how our products can help small businesses make a big impact.
